title: Clam Chowder
directions: Dice the salt pork or bacon and fry in a large pan.
When the fat is rendered, add the diced onions.
After the onions are softened, add the reserve clam broth from the can and the water, and potatoes.
Season liberally with salt, and several grinds of fresh pepper and bring to a boil.
After the potatoes are softened (15 minutes) turn down the heat and add the clams and corn cook for 5 minutes.
Add the milk, butter and heat through (3-5 minutes)
